bill.summary:
Financial Literacy Improvement for Professionals Act of 2020 or the FLIP Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Education to award grants to institutions of higher education, national nonprofits, and the Bureau of Indian Education to provide teachers with professional development activities related to financial literacy.
